title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication methods, so that I can protect my account from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Support OTPs and authentication apps
acceptance_criteria: Users must log in with both password and OTP or authentication app.
test_cases: Given a valid username and password, When the user enters the correct OTP or authentication app code, Then the user should be successfully logged in.

title: Enforce Strong Password Policies
description: As a user, I want to create a strong password, so that my account is less susceptible to breaches.
attributes_and_rules: Password policies should include minimum length, special character, number, uppercase, and lowercase.
acceptance_criteria: Users must create passwords that meet the security criteria.
test_cases: Given a registration form, When a user creates a password, Then the password should comply with defined security policies.

title: Protect Sensitive User Data Through Encryption
description: As a user, I want my sensitive data to be encrypted, so that it is secure from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Encrypt user data at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria: Sensitive user data should be encrypted using industry-standard encryption algorithms.
test_cases: Given user data, When data is stored or transmitted, Then it should be encrypted using defined standards.

title: User Session Management
description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely, so that my account remains protected during active sessions.
attributes_and_rules: Implement secure session management mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: User sessions should be securely managed, with timeout and invalidation rules.
test_cases: Given an active session, When the user logs out or the session times out, Then the session should be invalidated.

title: Display Relevant Products on Dashboard
description: As a user, I want to see products and services relevant to my profile on my dashboard, so that I can easily access what's applicable to me.
attributes_and_rules: Tailor displayed products based on profile data.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should dynamically display products and services based on user's profile.
test_cases: Given a user's profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display relevant products and services.

title: Enable User Profile Updates
description: As a user, I want to update my personal information, so that my profile remains current and accurate.
attributes_and_rules: Allow users to update their information with validations.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to update personal information with validation.
test_cases: Given access to profile settings, When a user updates their info, Then the system should validate and save the new data.

title: Provide Real-Time Insights
description: As a user, I want to see real-time insights into my balances and transactions, so that I can manage my finances effectively.
attributes_and_rules: Show up-to-date balances and recent transactions on the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should display real-time financial information.
test_cases: Given a user's account, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display real-time balances and transactions.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Streamlined Account Opening Process
description: As a potential customer, I want to easily open a new account, so that I can start using banking services with minimal hassle.
attributes_and_rules: Provide step-by-step account opening with minimal data entry.
acceptance_criteria: Account opening should involve a clear step-by-step process with minimal redundancy.
test_cases: Given an account opening workflow, When a user follows the steps, Then the account should be created with minimal hassle.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Request Account Modifications Easily
description: As an existing customer, I want to request account modifications easily, so that my service remains convenient and up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Facilitate straightforward account modification requests.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to request and track account modifications easily.
test_cases: Given an account modification form, When a user submits a request, Then the system should track and validate the modifications.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Real-Time Validation and Status Visibility
description: As a user, I want to see real-time validation and status of my account-related requests, so that I know exactly where I am in the process.
attributes_and_rules: Validate data in real-time and show request status.
acceptance_criteria: Real-time data validation and status updates should be visible throughout the process.
test_cases: Given an ongoing request, When data is submitted, Then validation and status should be updated in real-time.

title: Push Notifications for Account Requests
description: As a user, I want to receive push notifications about the status of my account requests, so that I am always informed about their progress.
attributes_and_rules: Send push notifications for request updates.
acceptance_criteria: Users should receive push notifications for key events in their account requests.
test_cases: Given an account request, When the status changes, Then the user should receive a push notification.

title: Configurable Notification Preferences
description: As a user, I want to configure my notification preferences, so that I receive updates in the format I prefer.
attributes_and_rules: Allow users to configure notification settings for push, SMS, and email.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to set notification preferences across different channels.
test_cases: Given user preferences, When the user sets preferences, Then notifications should follow those settings.

title: Secure Document Upload Feature
description: As a user, I want to securely upload identification documents, so that my applications can be processed efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Allow secure document uploads with privacy compliance.
acceptance_criteria: Documents should be uploadable securely via the portal.
test_cases: Given the need to upload documents, When a user selects a file, Then it should upload securely and meet compliance standards.

title: Resume Incomplete Applications
description: As a user, I want to resume incomplete applications, so that I can continue my process without losing progress.
attributes_and_rules: Implement autosave functionality for applications.
acceptance_criteria: Partially completed applications should be autosaved and resumable.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, When the user logs in again, Then they should be able to resume without lost data.

title: Real-Time Data Synchronization
description: As a user, I want real-time synchronization with the core banking systems, so that my account details are always up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Develop APIs for real-time data sync.
acceptance_criteria: User and transaction data should be synchronized in real-time with core systems.
test_cases: Given user data changes, When the core system updates, Then the portal should reflect changes in real-time.

title: Fallback Mechanisms for Connectivity Issues
description: As a user, I want seamless service even during connectivity issues, so that my experience is always smooth.
attributes_and_rules: Implement fallback mechanisms for connectivity issues.
acceptance_criteria: System should handle connectivity issues gracefully with fallback mechanisms.
test_cases: Given a connectivity issue, When a user performs an action, Then the system should use fallback mechanisms to maintain smooth operation.

title: Role-Based Feature Visibility
description: As an admin, I want to control feature visibility based on user roles, so that only authorized actions are performed.
attributes_and_rules: Allow admin to set role-based access controls.
acceptance_criteria: Users should only see and access features based on their roles.
test_cases: Given role-based access controls, When a user logs in with a specific role, Then they should only see permitted features.

title: Manage Admin and Customer Privileges
description: As an admin, I want to manage privileges for both admins and customers, so that security and service customization is maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Support admin and customer-level access controls.
acceptance_criteria: Privileges should be manageable for both admins and end-users.
test_cases: Given different user roles, When managing privileges, Then admins should have control over differentiated access.

title: Detailed User Interaction History
description: As a user, I want to see a detailed history of my interactions, so that I can track my past requests and actions.
attributes_and_rules: Maintain an immutable log of interactions.
acceptance_criteria: All user interactions should be logged and viewable.
test_cases: Given interaction logs, When a user views their history, Then they should see a detailed list of interactions.

title: Internal Compliance Audits
description: As an auditor, I want to perform internal audits on user interactions, so that compliance with regulations can be verified.
attributes_and_rules: Provide access to audit trails for compliance verification.
acceptance_criteria: Audit trails should be available and immutable for compliance audits.
test_cases: Given an audit requirement, When accessing logs, Then all trails should be verifiable and tamper-proof.

title: Responsive User Interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface across all devices, so that my experience is consistent irrespective of the device I use.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure the interface adapts to different devices and screen sizes.
acceptance_criteria: Interface should be responsive and consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given different devices, When the user accesses the portal, Then the interface should adjust responsively.

title: Usability Testing for Multi-Device Experience
description: As a tester, I want to conduct usability testing, so that I ensure accessibility and performance consistency across all devices.
attributes_and_rules: Conduct comprehensive usability testing across device types.
acceptance_criteria: Usability tests should confirm consistency and accessibility.
test_cases: Given multiple devices, When conducting usability tests, Then the experience should be validated for consistency and performance.
